vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the professional engineering services contract with CDM Smith, Inc. to provide additional services required for the Water Delivery Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition and Meandering Way High Improvements Project - Not to exceed $604,896.00, from $2,530,000.00 to $3,134,896.00 - Financing: Water Capital Improvement F Fund
